confirm.description:
###### ![AIS logo](/static/icons/ais_google_calendar.png)

This integration allows you to sync events between your scheduler and your Google Calendars.

 Do you want to set up Google Calendars integration?
confirm.title: Google Calendars

oauth.description:
Access to calendars requires authorization in Google. Click the **SUBMIT** below to start the authorization process

oauth.title: Authentication the access in Google

abort.single_instance_allowed:
You already have the integration to Google Calendars set up.

 If you want to reconfigure, remove the current integration first.
